name: Deathcap Dungeon
description:
Deathcap Dungeon is a deck-building strategy game which will challenge your creativity and resourcefulness. Battle through a bio-punk nightmare with retro pixel art styling. 

Rather than a diminishing resource system that limits player choice, Deathcap Dungeon makes use of a unique Phasing system. 

Any cards you do not use become stronger next turn. Will you use it now, or save it for an explosive combo? 

Every turn, the energy in the dungeon changes. Playing cards that matches that energy offers more powerful effects. Don't be caught relying on it, it really is a roll of the dice.


At the end of each encounter, you can choose a new card to add to your deck. These cards will be crucial in the battles that lie ahead... 

Clash with fearsome creatures and forge a path to the dungeon's reigning monarch. If you play your cards right, you might just live to tell the tale.
